title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A healthy mix of stir-fried vegetables with soy sauce, garlic, and sesame oil.
instructions: Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Fry onions and add tomato paste.
Add grilled chicken and cream to the sauce.
